channel.title: Development on Khoa học dữ liệu
channel.description: Recent content in Development on Khoa học dữ liệu

item.title: Basic HTML Elements
item.description: The main purpose of this article is to make sure that all basic HTML Elements are decorated with CSS so as to not miss any possible elements when creating new themes for Hugo.

item.title: Example
item.description: Hugo uses the excellent Go html/template library for its template engine. It is an extremely lightweight engine that provides a very small amount of logic. In our experience that it is just the right amount of logic to be able to create a good static website. If you have used other template systems from different languages or frameworks you will find a lot of similarities in Go templates.
